title: Drawing, Design for Lunette with Apollo, Mnemosyne and Jove, 1812
title_raw: Design for Lunette with Apollo, Mnemosyne and Jove
medium: Pen and brown ink on laid paper
inscribed: Pen and dark brown ink below drawing:  Appolo Menemosine Giove
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: In center, standing figure holds tablet or book in left arm.  Figure is flanked by two seated figures; the left one holds a torch (?), while the right one writes on tablet  Written in ink beneath: "Appolo Menemosine Giove."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Lunette with Apollo, Mnemosyne and Jove, 1812. Pen and brown ink on laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1649
